document_data.name: Sulene
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sulene''' was a young woman who worked at the [[Downunda Patisserie]] in [[Ravens Bluff]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LC/Aethalynmur's Wings|2-4}}
{{quote|G'day! Welcome to our anniversary celebration. We've been in this lovely city for six years. Can you imagine it, mates?|Sulene}}
document_data.Description: She had blue eyes that went well with the blue ruffled [[apron]] she wore.
document_data.Personality: She was a charming and cheery girl.
document_data.History: In [[Kythorn]] of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the Downunder Patisserie had its Sixth Anniversary Celebration, with many new treats and drinks on sale. One day, while Sulene was working the front counter, a group of adventurers stopped at the store for something to snack on and were served by her. But they were all interrupted by the appearance of [[Aethalynmur]], an almost {{SIAdj|8|ft|long=yes|adj=tall}} winged [[solar]] in a [[loincloth]]. Sulene was understandably a bit surprised by this, but asked what she could get him, though he required not a cake but heroes to liberate [[Nimbus City]] in the [[demi-plane]] of [[Arrus]]. So, Sulene served the adventurers and watched them negotiate with Aethalynmur and disappear into the [[planes]] while eating a sugar [[cookie]] and planning to tell her friends all about it.
